title: Virtual Life
description: Indulge in Dessert With NO GUILT!Ski like a pro, without the risk!Perform heart surgery with no a medical degree.Chase tornadoes in Kansas from your couch in Los Angeles.WELCOME TO VIRTUAL LIFE!Find out what it takes to become an astronaut.Experience a lawyer's life before investing in becoming one.Get into all the exclusive clubs without waiting in line, or rejection at the door.Immerse Yourself in Another's RealityOr LIVE STREAM your story, and Create Your Epic.Now Anyone Can BE SOMEONE!ENTER VIRTUAL LIFE...
author: J. Cafesin
